Name: Student Solutions Manual for University Physics Volumes 2 and 3 (chs. 21-44)

ReviewList.Text: Do not buy this thinking that you're going to get anywhere near even half of the problems out of the book it pairs with. The problems that it does contain are worked out with some explanation. This will not help you learn how to do problems that are not in the book as each problem is very different from the last. Honestly though, any help is better than none so I probably would still buy this book again even though it's not very useful.

The book does not contain even half of the solutions. It maybe has 1/3 of them, and only explains odd problems. The problems it does explain, it does so very well. Every other solution manual I have ever purchased contained every problem thoroughly worked out. I found all of the solutions in this book on chegg.com.

Used this to check my answers for my Physics 421 (Electro Magntism) class and it was great. This can be a lifesaver if you find yourself stuck on a problem because it contains detailed steps in problem solving. I would recommend this as a supplementary to the Physics Book.
i wish it was more question than it has. it has only every third question from book. but, they are nice explained
It does not include all solutions
It's nice having the solutions to select problems in the book so you can work them out and then see if you did it the right way.
